title: FS: George Bell Follow Through TOLSTOI with partial name on top.

posts.post_title: FS: George Bell Follow Through TOLSTOI with partial name on top.
posts.post_content:
Have a couple of unique (somewhat) oddities available. PP F&F only please. I'll pick up the shipping with tracking.

$[STRIKE]55[/STRIKE] $50 George Bell follow through. Tolstoi back with half his name on top. Beckett raw review of 1
$SOLD Dots Miller Polar Bear with a good chunk of a second back. 

As always, I'll listen to offers if my pricing is wrong.....
